#Discover the most competitive Dedicated Servers ever launched in Singapore and Australia!

- Are you looking for the best price/performance ratio for your current or future IT projects?
- Would you like to control your bill with an ultra competitive and all-inclusive pricing? 
- You can manage your own servers?

Look no further! 


##Discover your next DEDICATED SERVER: DO-32-APAC.  **$59.99 USD /month (recurring!)**


* Intel Xeon E3-1245v5  4c/8t - 3.5GHz /3.9GHz
* 32GB DDR4 ECC 2133 MHz
* SoftRAID 2x2TB (or upgrade to 2x480GB  SSD for FREE)
* Upload: 5000 GB of traffic/quota included (or upgrade to unlimited!) @250 Mbps 
* Download unlimited @1Gbps
* Anti-DDoS protection included (OVH has a 14Tbps network capacity)
* Singapore or Sydney Datacenter
* 1 IP v4 address included (Add additional IPs (up to 256) for a one-off $3 fee/IP)

 
#+

* Delivered in 120s
* Latest hardware
* Powerful anti-DDoS protection included
* Over 90 operating systems and licenses
* No contracts
* No setup fees
* Local technical support (Melbourne based)


#Links to the offer

Your are based in:

* Southeast Asia (USD): https://www.ovh.com/asia/dedicated-servers/enterprise/1806do01.xml
* Singapore (SGD): https://www.ovh.com/sg/dedicated-servers/enterprise/1806do01.xml
* AU/NZ (AUD): https://www.ovh.com.au/dedicated-servers/enterprise/1806do01.xml

    
* Rest of the world: USD: **https://www.ovh.com/world/dedicated-servers/enterprise/1806do01.xml**
* Rest of the world: EUR: https://www.ovh.ie/dedicated_servers/enterprise/1806do01.xml
* alternatively visit www.OVH.com to be redirected to your local/regional OVH website.


#Why buy a Dedicated Server?

* Manage a game server for your gaming community
* Host IO-intensive websites and applications
* Run a dedicated database server
* Host your own private virtualized environment
* Create a private IoT platform..


#Test the OVH network performance in Asia-Pacific

Datacenter: Sydney, Australia

    Test IPv4 : 139.99.130.17
    Test IPv6 : 2402:1f00:8100:211::1
    Test files : http://syd.infrastructures.ovh/
    Test latency : http://syd.smokeping.ovh.net/smokeping?target=APAC
    Looking Glass: https://lg.ovh.net/prefix_bgpmap/syd1/ipv4?q=9.9.9.9#
    Network status: http://weathermap.ovh.net/#apac

    Test IPv4 : 139.99.8.97
    Test IPv6 : 2402:1f00:8000:261::1
    Test files : http://sgp.infrastructures.ovh/
    Test latency : http://sgp.smokeping.ovh.net/smokeping?target=APAC

#About OVH

OVH is a global Cloud provider, offering innovative products and services with a focus on private, public and hybrid cloud, and bare metal (dedicated servers).

Founded in 1999, the OVH group manages and maintains 27 datacentres across 4 continents, deploys its own global fibre optic network, and has a full control over the supply chain (from server manufacturing and in-house maintenance of its infrastructure, right down to customer support). OVH offers businesses a benchmark for value and performance in the sector.
